body:
Oh thanx @untitaker 💚  - that has to to with the new navigation, you're right @carpodaster. I had to adapt some of the styling, since the old ribbon was not *"bootstrap-confirm*". I'll get Firefox and take care of this *(unless it's super urgent)*.

*Note to myself: the default image is also too big for the new nav.*
